Hi,

Am using heritrix-1.10.2, nutchwax-0.8.0, nutch-0.8.1, hadoop-0.5.0 my=

purpose is that i crawled the website using heritrix and get the
arc.gz fi=
les, now i want to make those arc.gz files searchable, for
that am using nu=
tchwax, it generates the index of those arc.gz files.
once i get the index =
i can search that with queries. but the problem
is when i search for some q=
uery it returns me results with summaries,
but i want to get the content of=
 page, when i saw in
crawl/segment/content there is no file with size more =
that 1kb.

I suppose that when we generate the index using nutchwax of arc.=
gz
file it does not retrieve the content of crawled pages.
Is there any way=
 by which i can get the contents of crawled pages from
index generated by n=
utchwax.
